heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_riki
heroes.bio_loc: Riki was born middle child to the great dynasty of Tahlin. With an older brother groomed for the throne, and a younger brother coddled and kept, Riki, the small middle son, seemed born for the art of invisibility.  It was an art he cultivated, and one which ultimately saved his life on the night that his people were betrayed and his family slaughtered. Of all the royal line, he alone escaped, small and agile, unassuming, using smoke as cover. He cut his way out of the royal grounds, using the advantage of surprise, quietly slitting the throats of one enemy warrior after another. Now free of his royal responsibilities, Riki uses his talents in service to a new trade: Stealth Assassin. He silences his enemies, sharpening his skills, hoping to one day take revenge on those who killed his family and robbed him of his birthright.
heroes.hype_loc: Riki stalks the battlefield, unseen by the enemy. He chooses his moment carefully and bursts forth in a puff of silencing smoke, stabbing at his foes before they even know he's there.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Remains permanently invisible until the moment to strike

facets.description_loc: This facet doesn't do anything. Riki is still looking to avenge the House of Tahlin...
facets.name: riki_riki

abilities.name: riki_smoke_screen
abilities.desc_loc: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies and causing them to miss attacks.
abilities.lore_loc: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.
notes_loc: Can be cast during Tricks of the Trade.
Doesn't prevent the use of active items.
abilities.shard_loc: Enemies caught in the smoke screen have their armor reduced by %armor_reduction% and cannot be targeted by their allies.

abilities.name: riki_blink_strike
abilities.desc_loc: Teleports behind the target unit, momentarily slowing them and attacking them with bonus damage if it is an enemy.
abilities.lore_loc: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.

abilities.name: riki_tricks_of_the_trade
abilities.desc_loc: CHANNELED - Riki phases out of the world and periodically strikes %interval_targets% random enemy units from behind in an area around him. He has fixed attack damage while phased out.
abilities.lore_loc: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.
abilities.scepter_loc: Increases Cast Range. Allows you to target an allied unit, hiding inside them for the duration. While hiding in an allied unit, they have %scepter_movespeed%%% bonus movement speed, and Tricks of the Trade lasts %scepter_bonus_duration%s longer and does an additional %scepter_bonus_attacks% attacks.
facets_loc: Tricks of the Trade has %creep_agility_multiplier%x Agility Bonus when attacking non-hero units. When Riki kills a non-hero unit during Tricks of the Trade, the cooldown is reduced by %cooldown_reduction_per_creep_kill%s.

abilities.name: riki_innate_backstab
abilities.desc_loc: Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals additional bonus damage equal to a multiple of his Agility.
notes_loc: Works when denying friendly units at %ally_multiplier%%% effectiveness.
Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
facets_loc: Riki receives bonus experience for assists and kills.

abilities.name: riki_backstab
abilities.desc_loc: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible until he attacks. Hero kills and assists grant additional experience.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_riki_tricks_dmg
talents.name_loc: {s:bonus_base_attack_damage_pct}% of Riki's Base damage added to Tricks of the Trade
